article_metadata.description: Most crises do not start as the catastrophes they turn into. Most are the end result of ignored facts, compounded by poor decisions and a failure to act in a timely fashion. All are known entities and causes ignored until they blossom into a full blown predicament. The student loan debt “crisis” is classic dish constructed of these causes. It is a dish that has many chefs and no dishwashers and government intervention has and will continue to make it worse.Presidential candidates
article_metadata.author: Jeff Chidester

og.description: Most crises do not start as the catastrophes they turn into. Most are the end result of ignored facts, compounded by poor decisions and a failure to act
og.title: Dealing with student loan crisis
